# Tongue of Baalzebul (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M (a tongue from any creature capable of speech), Drug (mushroom powder)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** Caster

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC), pg. 107

The caster gains the ability to lie, seduce, and beguile with a devilâ€™s skill. He gains a +2 competence bonus on [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]] and [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]], checks.
